name: Brownie Batter
description: Indulge in the ultimate chocolate fantasy with our Brownie Batter macaron. This decadent treat encapsulates the gooey richness of freshly mixed brownie batter encased in a crisp, airy macaron shell.

name: Birthday Cake
description: Celebrate every day with our Birthday Cake macaron. Imagine the joy of a festive, fluffy vanilla cake, complete with rainbow sprinkles, all wrapped up in a delicate macaron.

name: Biscoff Buttercream
description: Experience the unique taste of Europe with our Biscoff Buttercream macaron, featuring a silky buttercream that's richly infused with the caramelized splendor of Biscoff cookies.

name: Passionfruit Infused White Chocolate
description: Escape to the tropics with each bite of our Passionfruit Infused White Chocolate macaron. The vibrant tartness of passionfruit perfectly complements the sweet, velvety white chocolate filling.

name: Dulce de Leche
description: Savor the sweet allure of our Dulce de Leche macaron. Rich, creamy caramel is beautifully balanced with a light, delicate macaron shell for a luxurious treat.

name: Cookies and Cream
description: Enjoy the delightful contrast of our Cookies and Cream macaron, featuring crunchy cookie bits mingled with smooth cream in a classic flavor combination.

name: Churros
description: Relish the warmth of our Churros macaron, where the nostalgic taste of cinnamon sugar blends perfectly with the delicate crunch of the macaron shell.

name: Snickerdoodle
description: Dive into the sweet comfort of our Snickerdoodle macaron, where hints of cinnamon spice meet the soft, chewy texture of a classic cookie.

name: Cream Cheese Frosting and Jam
description: Delight in the lush harmony of our Cream Cheese Frosting and Jam macaron, featuring a rich, tangy cream cheese paired with a sweet, fruity jam center.

image.alt: Cream Cheese Frosting and Jam Macaron

name: Starburst Buttercream
description: Experience a burst of fruit flavors with our Starburst Buttercream macaron, where vibrant, candy-inspired hues meet a silky, smooth buttercream.

name: White Chocolate Ganache
description: Indulge in the decadence of our White Chocolate Ganache macaron, featuring a lush, creamy filling encased in a light, crisp shell.

name: Snickers
description: Embrace the indulgence of our Snickers macaron, a perfect blend of chocolate, caramel, and peanuts, mirroring the beloved candy bar.

name: Nutella Ganache
description: Savor the rich, chocolate-hazelnut fusion of our Nutella Ganache macaron, where creamy Nutella ganache fills a perfectly textured shell.

name: Gingerbread Cookie
description: Get cozy with our Gingerbread Cookie macaron, featuring the warm, spicy flavors of traditional gingerbread with a sweet, molasses undertone.

name: Hot Chocolate Ganache
description: Warm up with our Hot Chocolate Ganache macaron, where rich chocolate ganache is complemented by a hint of marshmallow for a winter treat.

name: Chocolate Ganache
description: Experience the classic elegance of our Chocolate Ganache macaron, with its smooth, rich chocolate filling and crisp, airy shell.

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
description: Celebrate the season with our Pumpkin Cheesecake macaron, blending creamy cheesecake with a hint of pumpkin and spice for a festive treat.

name: Peppermint Bark
description: Embrace the holiday spirit with our Peppermint Bark macaron, where crisp peppermint and rich chocolate combine in a festive, minty delight.
